resources.string: NOTIFY WHEN THINGS I LIKE ARE ON SALE
CHECK LOCAL INVENTORY FOR THIS TIME

This app gives drink recommendations from the LCBO. It also allows the user to explore the LCBO's inventory and search for particular items. 

 To use this app: 
 1) From the main menu touch either the 'QUICK RATE' or 'BROWSE' options. If in 'BROWSE', fill out any desired search options and click on the search button. 

 2) You will be presented with a list of LCBO drinks. For detailed information on a product, tap it. To rate a product, swipe right for drinks you like and left for drinks you don't. The more products your rate, the more accurate your recommendations will be.

 3) After rating some products, press the back button to get to the main menu. From there click 'RECOMMEND'. The details of an item (presented when an item is touched) will inform the user which local stores are currently carrying this item. 

 4) To review past ratings, choose the 'LOGS' button from the main menu. From there you can long click on a particular item to either view its details, or delete it from your rating profile.

 5) Under 'Settings', you may choose how far the app should search for local stores. You also have the option to delete all past ratings you have given.

 Note: Sometimes, if you filter items through a particular store and click on the details, the local store will not appear in the list of stores that carry the item. This indicates the store usually carries the item but currently has none in stock.

 This app is not funded or endorsed by the LCBO.
